website_summaries.verdict: Fancy bronze based lamp with a traditional style.
pros: Sturdy lamp with some weight to it
Frosted white glass shade makes it a great reading light
cons: Only takes one bulb, so light comes from one side of the unit
Pull switch has a tight spring to it and can flip up and damage the glass

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It sits next to an older white one with frosted glass, which looks a bit nicer, but most are smooth glass. I love the White especially! The look is not as common as green. The base is a bronze color. I think most people would find this functional as a reading lamp, desk lamp, nightstand lamp. It’s great looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bedding

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice lamp! It seems to be quite sturdy and well-made, does not look cheap at all. Received is super fast - in just two days after ordering (with FREE super saver shipping!) in excellent condition (some reviewers mentioned broken glass, but not in my case). It even included the light bulb! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Iris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a graduation gift for my niece and she loves it. I did inspect it and there is a bubble flaw in the glass shade, but it's not too noticeable and she didn't care. I think the base on this one is a little fancier than the other models I saw, and the curved post looks nicer to me as well. I just ordered another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rob N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: Although the color is a little off; it is a nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Banker's Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Looks great on my desk. Works well with Phillips energy saving light bulbs. The cost of shipping to Kuwait was minimum. The item arrived broken. Was contacted by Fedex agent before the sent item to me. I contacted Amazon who promptly refunded my payment including shipping fees. I reordered again and the lamp arrived about four or five days after, minus the shipping cost. Very happy and satisfied customer with both product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect on the antique office desk we inherited and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It's perfect on the antique office desk we inherited and the light it shines is just enough when we need it. It's pretty, yet my husband loves the look and thinks it's just masculine enough and not pretty. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Quilt Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamp, but color is not as described. Its more of a light off grey color. Not a dark bronze like pictured.
customer_reviews.author: SUB

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got the for a Christmas gift. It was bent. Too much to pack up and ship back so I’m just dealing with it... plus the color doesn’t match the description.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Haaf

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that looks elegant. This lamp has worked out great. Much fancier than any standard, boring looking light. Collects dust maybe a bit too easily, but not a single problem with it in the years since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: william stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive lamp and is nicely weighted and balanced. It's also a good size for a bedside table. The lampshade is substantial and gives off a good amount of soft light. The pull apparatis is smooth and works well. The lamp I received had chipped paint on the base which showed base metal beneath. The metal frame that holds the lampshade was crooked. Not crazy about the paint over base metal, but had it not been chipped and had the framing been straight I would have kept it. It's going back. Quality not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: pmisun

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. Not bad for the price. But the light only shines from the left side of the lamp shade where the light bulb is. Not throughout the whole lamp shade. Which is not something I would have thought about before buying. So that's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband’s office
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for! Perfect for my husband’s office.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old one. It is made very well. Heavy brass. Nicely finished. It is well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: And then there was light
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lamp; great quality; gives off alot of light; perfect for my husbands desk.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores OMalley

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp for your desk
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it...it's funny, but Amazon requested the certain number of words, so I copied & pasted.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Lvovsky

customer_reviews.title: Solid Lamp, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with this purchase, you can tell it's made with quality materials and looks good in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Coldcrushforce

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Thought the base would be a bit lighter....it's a really really deep dark color. Love the glass shade and that it is white instead of green like most other banker lamps. Very heavy base. Nicely made...worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Youngmomma

customer_reviews.title: different appearance,crack,inclination
customer_reviews.text: it has different appearance,crack on the side of glass and inclination. I ordered this lamp from tokyo japan so it will take long time to return to US and get new one. the maker should be careful of shipping and treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Yohei Kontani

customer_reviews.title: What a disaster!
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks after I ordered this lamp, it arrived at my house with the glass shade broken. After talking to three different people on the invoice, they agreed to send me a replacement shade. Two weeks later that arrived--broken! I took a picture, and they agreed to send me another one. That one arrived intact (again, two weeks later), but it is almost impossible to get a new shade on, as you have to flex the metal without breaking the glass. As I was trying to perform this task, under the pressure of the metal, the glass shade BROKE! They can keep their money-- I'm not wasting any more time with them.
customer_reviews.author: El Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: shed a lot of light
customer_reviews.text: i'd been getting by in my office with a number of different lamps. now i've seen the light. this lamp is is ecellent;heavy, good looking, and more than suits it's purpose. the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: michael decker

customer_reviews.title: Desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: It works well for my purposes. It is bright for reading and yet it does not take up alot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. It givesgood light directly where you have it focused.
customer_reviews.author: janet donica

customer_reviews.title: Banker's lamp
customer_reviews.text: We were very please with our new banker's lamp. It is exactly what we ordered. The lamp arrived soon after we placed our order. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Switch broke in 3 months. Paint color is cheap. Would not recommend. Very disappointed in this purchase. . . .
customer_reviews.author: David Ditillo

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: Quite a presentable table lamp except the glass shade is too thin & very fragile. Will be a preferred to buy item if the glass is not fragile & easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: just what I expected....perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my college bound son...Would definitely buy this again! It came in perfect condition! :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I liked this lamp. It's the right size for the desk I have it on. Works well and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernestine LeGrande

customer_reviews.title: Banker's Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Shipping takes a long time. Great quality (real glass shade) and function for the price. Be sure to select the finish you want.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: not quite
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when receiving this lamp. I thought for $75 I would get a decent lamp. The texture on the metal was a little rough-made than I thought. Instead, I bought a different one from Amazon. Golden Brass Desk lamp from Conoco piano lampsIt is lower price but the quality is a LOT better. Highly recommend the other one from Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Hmm... a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when receiving this lamp. I thought for $75 I would get a decent lamp. The texture on the metal was a little rough-made than I thought. Instead, I bought a different one from Amazon.It is lower price but the quality is a LOT better. Highly recommend the other one from Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent assistance - great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Visiondecor's banker's lamp with an antique base as a gift. I selected their lamp because of the excellent price and product's appearance. Regretfully the recipient did not want the antique brass base, but preferred polished brass. When I told Visiondecor of this problem, they didn't hesitate to give me a full refund, including no shipping charges. I wish I could have kept the lamp for myself. It's very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

product_meta.title: Lite Source LS-224D/BRZ Banker's Lamp, Dark Bronze with Frost Glass Shade
product_meta.description:
Color:BronzeLite Source has an exceptional line of quality products aimed to please even the most discerning of consumers. Relish in the design of this 1 light Desk Lamp; from the details in the Frosted Glass, to the double coated bronze finish, this Desk Lamp is not only durable, but a tastefully elegant showpiece.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Lite Source banker styled lamp utilizes a frosted glass shade and a hand highlighted dark bronze finish with slight distressing around the edges. A new finish to this old-time lamp! Looking at it, the Banker lamp adds a classic transition to the past with what used to be common in all banking centers. Add a nostalgic flare to your home office or work area with this lighting fixture. The Banker desk lamp offer's a modern twist on the traditional style of a banker's lamp. The decorative table lamp gives lightness and a contemporary feel to the lamp's elegant base.
feature_bullets: Lite Source desk lamp from the Banker Collection
Dark bronze with a frosted glass shade
Classic bankers lamp with a pull-chain switch
Lamp dimensions: 14.5-Inch height by 10.5-Inch wide by 7-Inch
